Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Wilcox
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Wilcox.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Wilcox.
